Texts.Chs: 对于一位开路骑士，为人民副武是首当其冲的，永远记住这一点！你赢得了你的子民的尊重，也赢得了我的。现在，你必须证明你的力量，因为开路骑士必须能够保护他的家人。
Texts.Eng: A Keffrider is a servant of the people first and foremost, always remember that! You've earned the respect of your tenants, and mine with it. Now, you must prove your strength, for a Keffrider must be able to protect his kin.

Texts.Chs: 你想不想成为一位开路骑士，船长？如果你能证明自己配得上这个头衔，我会让议会授予你^orange;开路骑士证件^white;！^green;赢得阿威坎子民的尊重^white;然后展示^orange;五个阿威坎礼品^white;给我看，这就是我们要走的第一步！
Texts.Eng: How would you like to become a Keffrider, Captain? If you prove yourself worthy of the title I'll get the Council to grant you your ^orange;Keffrider's license^white;! ^green;Earn the respect of Avikan tenants ^white;and show me ^orange;five Avikan Gifts^white;, and we'll get this started!
